title: Screams For Tina - Strobelight Funeral (1986) FLAC
description:
Screams For Tina
Strobelight Funeral (1986)

1. Nightmare
2. Fool's Gold
3. Simple Addictions
4. Future Of Romance
5. Strobelight Funeral

Dark Illusion Records SFT 001
Produced by Screams For Tina
Recorded at West Beach Studios
Los Angeles, CA 1985 by John Girdler

Band:
Warren Mansfield: Vocals, Bass, Keyboards
Marvin Rinnig: Guitar, Treatments

All songs by W. Mansfield/M. Rinnig

Drums on Nightmare: Clark Pardee
Drums on Simple Addictions: Phillip Maturano

Cover Phoptos: M. Rinnig
Image Model: Shannon
Layout & Artwork: W. Mansfield

Audio lineage:
LP (NM condition) -> Sony PS-LX250H turntable (built in pre-amp) -> MOTU 828mk2 stereo line input -> PowerMac G5 (OSX 10.5.6) via FW400
Recorded with BIAS Peak 6.0.5 at 24-bit, 88.2kHz
Edited with BIAS Peak 6.0.5 including noise reduction with BIAS Soundsoap 2.1.1
Converted with XLD 20090216 (101.0) (libFLAC 1.2.1) to FLAC files
